name: Exodus (itch) (cloudsmith)
description:
Exodus

Game Description

What if you were to arrive in heaven and find that you were totally alone? Exodus is a story of discovery, heroism, and what it means to push through fear. You play as a newly awakened resident of heaven met with only the final words of a cloaked figure;

"It is up to you now. Show him".

From this point your journey begins.
